titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on bitolylene diisocyanate (TODI).
To extend the temporary suspension of duty on bitolylene diisocyanate (TODI).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on bitolylene diisocyanate (TODI).
